p.k: New teacher Sidney Poitier tries to inspire the students of a rough east London school using his own unorthodox methods. Touching drama co-starring Lulu

p.n: Escape From The Planet Of The Apes
p.k: 63% Apes Cornelius, Zira and Milo crash land on Earth where their newfound celebrity soon changes to notoriety and suspicion. Sequel starring Roddy McDowall
70% Classic romantic drama starring Richard Gere as a troubled trainee naval officer who falls for Debra Winger's sassy factory girl
69% Five friends attempting an epic pub crawl end up with the fate of the world in their hands. Comedy starring Simon Pegg and Nick Frost
76% Dazzling comic book comedy about a geeky teen whose efforts to fight crime land him in trouble with a real-life super-villain
65% Chris D'Amico sets out to get revenge on Kick-Ass and Hit-Girl in this brutal comic book comedy. Aaron Taylor-Johnson stars
72% Julia Roberts, Clive Owen, Natalie Portman and Jude Law: two boys, two girls, two couples. But who ends up with whom? Crackling drama
